alert.note: Alert for Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:17AM EST until December 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern New York, including the following county, Clinton. * WHEN...Until 130 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1016 AM EST, emergency management reported flooding in the warned area, with a portion of Rt. 11 closed. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chazy, Champlain and Perry Mills. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
